description: This middle-eastern spiced dish is bursting with flavour and different textures.
keywords: Roast pork,Seafood free,Soy free,Wheat free,Egg free,Pork,Lemon
name: Dukkah Spiced Pork with Carrot, Lentils & Feta Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Pre-heat the oven to 180°C/160°C fan-forced. Toss the carrots with a little oil, 1 tsp of dukkah and half of the honey in a roasting tin and roast for 20 minutes.
Brush the pork slices with oil and rub all over with dukkah. Place in the roasting tin with the carrots and cook for 7-8 minutes until cooked through.

Heat the lentils according to pack instructions. In a large salad bowl, toss the lentils, feta, lemon juice and zest, coriander and the remaining oil with the rocket. Add the roasted carrots and toss well.
Serve the lentil and carrot salad topped with pork and a drizzle of honey on top.
